test.instr: (:ins (:task (putdown X) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X red))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X white) (sort Y closet) (type Y container))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X red) (sort Y washmachine) (type Y container))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X workspace))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X black))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X white) (sort Y closet) (type Y container))) )
test.nl: Put down the red remotecontrol. Put the white cup on closet. Put the red cup in the washmachine. Go to workspace. Pick up the black book. Put the bottle on the table.
